reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made, comfortable, and flattering, with one noting how it accentuates hips and booty.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great form fitting dress for any formal event
items.body: Let me start off by saying this dress was comfortable and cute! I wore this for my cousin’s wedding party and no one could have guessed that I got it from Amazon. Very elegant and showed off my curves! I am 5’6” and 205 lbs and I got a Large. It fit me perfectly. I do have to say that I am 2 months postpartum and did wear spanx in this picture and you can’t even tell! The material is thick and well made. This dress does not have pockets. I believe it functioned well for the event I wore it for. My only complaint is that the slit of the dress was a little high and I pinned it so my thigh wasn’t fully showing and so my spanx didn’t show. Overall I loved the dress and I received a lot of compliments on it. Everyone assumed I bought it from a fashion website and paid a lot of money for it. I also like that it comes in different colors as well so I can buy another for any occasion. I’d recommend buying this for any formal occasion. Read more
items.author: Bianca K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Seriously, this dress is gorgeous! The color was exactly as pictured, which is always a win. It fit perfectly true to size, and I was so happy that it was really flattering and hid my tummy area. I wore it out and received so many compliments from people. I'm already thinking about getting it in another color! Read more
items.author: Lia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall fit
items.body: So comfortable, and fit was true to size. I took this on a cruise for elegant night and it was wrinkle free coming out of the suitcase! I have zero complaints about this dress. I loved the fit, style, fabric, and travel-ability. Read more
items.author: Kristie Stockton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good
items.body: All the reviews are true. Wear this dress, and you'll get a ton of compliments. It was comfortable, looked great, and was just about the perfect wife of the father of the bride dress. I needed something that fit amazingly well, floor length, nice enough that I looked like I belonged with the father of the bride, but not so fancy I looked like I was trying to upstage more important people. This dress fit the bill nicely. My biggest headache with the dress was getting the creases from shipping out of it. I tried hanging it to let them fall out (it hung for two months and still had creases), getting it wet and hanging to dry, washing and drying on permanent press (it held up to that great, but it didn't fix the creases), and ironing on my iron's synthetic setting. I finally gave up the day before the wedding and took it to a dry cleaner - they worked some magic and get the wrinkles out of the dress. Another annoyance I had with the dress that I didn't see mentioned in other reviews is that it did not stay put. I lost count of how many times I had to adjust it over the course of the evening. It didn't really ride up, but it kept twisting so that the right side seam was about 4-6 inches rotated toward the front of the dress. It still looked okay from the front, but the center seam down the back looked weird curving off the right. So I had to keep grabbing both side seams and yanking it back around into the proper position. Thankfully it was an adjustment that was quick and not one I needed privacy for, but it would have been nice to not have to keep doing that! The fit was pretty much as I expected. I ordered a small and medium and ended up choosing the medium. It is form-fitting and stretches over your hips. The small was just a little too tight over my hips, but fit my top half better. The medium for nicely in the hips and was a little large up top, but not bad. The arm holes were a little big at the underarm, so my bra peeked out just the tiniest bit, but was barely noticeable with the nude color bra. I wore 2.5 inch heels and the dress was for length but not dragging on the ground. The slit came to mid thigh and did not at all feel inappropriate, especially with the ruffle covering the top of it. I wore Spanx shorts underneath, and only about half an inch peaked out at the top of the slit if you looked for it under the ruffle. I'm 5'7"and 133 pounds, 34C. I had some trouble figuring out how to accessorize this dress, but I found that a fancy pin at the top of the ruffle really added some interest and took the dress up a level. I added a coordinating necklace and called it good. Read more
items.author: Kristin Horner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but nice black gown
items.body: Very nice dress. Looking for one with long sleeves. It is stretchy, deep black, simple yet classy. Bodyfit but not unflattering. Ruching around waist is great. The sleeves are different so it makes the dress different. Read more
items.author: TBD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress
items.body: Loved the dress! The material is great, doesn't ride up, is soft and very comfortable. I liked how it shapes the body. I ordered a medium size and fits perfects Read more
items.author: Maria Aye Lopez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird around the tummy
items.body: I know many have commented that the gathered ruching around the tummy was a positive for them - on me it looked more like a pregnancy dress than ruching or draping. The color is that beautiful, rich royal blue. It's fairly stretchy, which is always a positive for fit. but in the thinner side as some have mentioned. I would have preferred just a teeny extra weight/thickness to it for sturdiness and longevity of wear/tear. Overall the silhouette was lovely. Wearing it felt okay, good movement to the material, hugs curves nicely. But the tummy part just didn't do it for me as it did for others. Other, vary similar dresses seem to be a better fit for my frame. I want to say the dress runs a little bit of anything size wise. I'm 5'9" an athletic 165-170 and the Large felt baggy and loose (not "body on"). Read more
items.author: K.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: This dress was perfect for a formal Fall wedding I attended. It was very comfortable, fit great, and I got many compliments. I’m 5’4/ 125lbs and the medium fit perfectly. I wore 2inch dress sandals but was also able to kick off my shoes on the dance floor without tripping over it (the back dragged a little with no shoes but it wasn’t a problem) I was very happy to find a dress that didn’t need any alterations. The royal blue color was is so pretty! Highly recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Lynne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Split Bodycon Cocktail Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Split Bodycon Cocktail Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Magenta, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
